result.title: Computer Vision Researcher/Engineer - Creative Vision
result.description:
Job Responsibility:

* Invent novel technologies that enable new mobile camera experiences.
* Push the boundaries of what is possible in machine learning, computer vision, and graphics.
* Introduce innovations that can result in product features or new areas of business for short video products.
* Collaborate with engineering teams to ship product features.

 

Job Requirements:

* PhD in a technical field such as computer science or equivalent experience.

* Experience in computer vision, machine learning, deep learning, graphics.

* Experience in shipping relevant product features.

* Programming experience in one or more of the following: Python, C, C++.

* Successful record of publication in top-tier international research venues (e.g. ICLR, AAAI, NeurIPS, CVPR, ECCV, ICCV, SIGGRAPH) is a plus.

* Fluency in both written and spoken English and Mandarin is a must.
